## ReadableEthersKumo class

Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableKumo](./lib-base.readablekumo.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ReadableEthersKumo implements ReadableKumo 
```
**Implements:** [ReadableKumo](./lib-base.readablekumo.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ReadableEthersKumo` class.
